title: Grow More Give More: Planting a Raised Bed Garden

subtasks: Determine plant spacing requirements based on vegetable type
Use one-foot square spacing for small vegetables
Use two-foot spacing for large vegetables
Apply dense planting techniques for high yield

tasks.task: Access extension resources for more information
subtasks: Visit online resource (aces.edu) for detailed information

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Planting a raised bed garden
subtasks: Understand the block planting design for efficient space utilization
Determine appropriate plant spacing (24 inches for tomatoes/squash, 18 inches for cabbage/broccoli, 24 inches for corn/lettuce, etc.)
Apply dense planting techniques to maximize yield per square foot

tasks.task: Access extension resources for more information
subtasks: Contact local county extension office for assistance
Visit online resource (aces.edu) for detailed information
